dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Server Issue]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, July 31, 2005 6:57 PM
To: ian@iuni.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Server Issue]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Server Issue
Date: Sat, 30 Jul 2005 15:54:27 -0700
From: Ian McGregor <ian@iuni.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
CC: admins@theplanet.com

ThePlanet.com,

One of your servers is currently distributing copyrighted software of ours.
The FBI have been notified. You are required to remove our software
immediately or we will be faced to lodge a complaint against ThePlanet.com
Internet Services, Inc.

We will check back in 48 hours, after which we will assume your company is
involved in this illegal activity and will be dealt with accordingly.

Illegal software is being stored at:

http://70.84.149.68/~wmuhomes/ with downloads such as: http://
70.84.149.68/~wmuhomes/iuPro-2.0.0.dmg

The links to the software can be located at:
http://www.macupdate.com/info.php/id/15724
http://www.macupdate.com/info.php/id/11251
http://www.macupdate.com/info.php/id/11253

Macupdate.com is not an authorized distributor of this software, and are
currently under investigation by the authorities.

Our product names are easily identified by:

iuPro
iuLoan
iuAssets
iuTime

This individual may be illegally storing our software in other locations
which we are currently determining.

Your co-operation in this matter is appreciated,

Sincerely,

Ian McGregor
CEO, Chief Developer
iUNI Technologies Corp.




- ------------------------------------------------------------------------
- -------------------

iUNI Technologies Corp.
Web: http://www.iuni.com

- ------------------------------------------------------------------------
- -------------------

The contents of this electronic mail message are strictly confidential. Any
materials including but not limited to text, images, software, code,
archives which are the property of iUNI shall remain the property of iUNI.
iUNI shall not be liable for any effects or consequences arising from the
materials in this message. Questions concerning privacy and/or other legal
matters can be directed to www.iuni.com/en/contact.html. The term iUNI shall
apply to iUNI Technologies Corp. and its representatives.



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFC7WVKvK/XpJs6oyURApV+AKCJ+eHIpMvuAbUnyaUByi+ry+L5BwCfTJYJ
PgFculwGo3Ps2GwvAoMS0uA=
=xaIy
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
